articles.title: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff: This isn’t our first SaaSpocalypse
articles.description: Salesforce reported a solid year-end earnings and then pulled out all the stops to ward. off more talk of the death of its business to AI.
articles.summary: Despite fears that artificial intelligence might threaten Salesforce's core SaaS model, CEO Marc Benioff assured investors and customers alike during the company's year-end earnings report presentation.
points: CEO Marc Benioff refuted doomsday AI predictions for salesforce business
AI predicted to disrupt SaaS industry, specifically Salesforce model by automating tasks
Benioff emphasized ongoing commitment and innovation at the heart of company's future

insight.text: The insights from this article suggest that despite market fears about AI, industry leaders like Marc Benioff are confident in their ability to adapt and integrate new technologies without compromising their business model.

articles.title: [SECON 2026] 한국산업기술시험원, 보안검색장비 시험인증
articles.description: 다양한 보안 솔루션을 대상으로 성능, 안전성, 신뢰성 평가 수행3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 한국산업기술시험원(KTL)은 국가 산업의 기술 경쟁력 강화와 국민 안전 확보를 목적으로 시험·인증·검사 및 기술 지원 서비스를 제공하는 종합 공공시험인증기관이다.KTL은 전기·전자, 정보통신, 기계·소재, 에너지·환경, 바
articles.summary: KTL 이용한 2~3문장 요약
points: KTL는 국가 산업의 기술 경쟁력 강화와 국민 안전 확보를 위한 시험·인증·검사 서비스를 제공
KTL은 다양한 보안 솔루션의 성능과 신뢰성을 평가하고, 안전성을 보장
이를 위해 전기·전자, 정보통신, 기계·소재, 에너지·환경, 바이나일 설명과 테스트 방식을 제공
articles.insight: KTL의 실증서비스는 IT/기술 업계에서의 더 안정적인 보안적용이 가능한 3~5년 후까지의 도전입니다.

articles.title: [eGISEC 2026] 소버린월렛, 블록체인 메인넷 플랫폼 메타무이
articles.description: 스테이블코인, CBDC, 기업용 결제 시스템에 특화3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 소버린월렛은 블록체인 기술 기업으로, 블록체인 혁신과 규제 준수의 격차를 해소한다는 사명 아래 차세대 디지털 금융을 위한 결제 인프라를 개발하고 있다.메타무이는 스테이블코인·CBDC·기업용 결제 시스템에 특화된 블록체인 메인넷 플랫폼으

articles.title: LG U+, MWC서 해킹 사전 차단 및 무력화 보안 기술 4종 선보여
articles.description: 알파키, 동형암호, PQC 전용회선, U+SASE 공개 [보안뉴스 강현주 기자] LG유플러스가 모바일월드콩그레스 2026(MWC26)에서 AI 확산과 함께 고도화되는 사이버 위협에 대응하기 위한 차세대 보안 기술을 4종을 공개한다고 26일 밝혔다. LG유플러스는 AI 기반 분석, 암호 기술 고도화, 미래 위협까지 대비하는 보안
articles.summary: LG의 기술 제품이 MWC에서4종의 AI 기반 보안 기술을 공개하여 모바일위대행에 익명처리를 통한 위협입니다.
points: AI 기반 분석, PQC 기술, AI 이용, U+SASE 공개
4종의 AI 기반 보안 기술을 모바일 위대행에서 MWC에서 공개한다.
4종의 기술은 모바일 우선설정과 자체 분산성이 포인트에 뿌림
articles.insight: 보안 기술 공개는 LG의 AI 기술이 모바일위대행을 위한 보호융산과 암인터럽에서 중요한 전문 시스템으로 생각되는 지점을 나타냅니다.

articles.title: 지니언스, 싱가포르 첫 고객 확보... “APAC 확대 신호탄”

articles.title: Gushwork bets on AI search for customer leads — and early results are emerging
articles.description: Gushwork has raised $9 million in a seed round led by SIG and Lightspeed. The startup has seen early customer traction from AI search tools like ChatGPT.
articles.summary: Gushwork has raised $9 million in a seed round led by SIG and Lightspeed. The startup has seen early customer traction from AI search tools like ChatGPT
points: Gushwork has raised $9 million in a seed round led by SIG and Lightspeed
The startup has seen early customer traction from AI search tools like ChatGPT
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Anthropic acquires computer-use AI startup Vercept after Meta poached one of its founders
articles.description: Seattle-based Vercept developed complex agentic tools, including a computer-use agent that could complete tasks inside applications like a person with a laptop would.
articles.summary: Vercept, an AI startup focused on creating agents capable of performing complex computer tasks as if they were human users, has been acquired by Anthropic after being poached from Meta.
points: Anthropic acquires Vercept for its agentic tools developed to mimic human-like interaction with computers.
The acquisition follows the hiring of one of Vercept'ran founders, Adrian C. Crockford, by Meta (now known as Facebook).
Verect has been working on AI agents that perform tasks like navigating apps and interfaces without explicit user input.
articles.insight: The acquisition highlights the high demand for advanced computer-user interaction technologies in Silicon Valley, with major companies often competing to hire top talent from smaller startups. This could signify a shift towards AI integrations becoming commonplace as businesses seek efficiency and cost savings.

articles.title: Nvidia has another record quarter amid record capex spends
articles.description: "The demand for tokens in the world has gone completely exponential," Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said about the company's earnings.
articles.summary: Nvidia reported another record quarter with significant capex spends amidst rising demand for tokens in blockchain technology.
points: Jensen Huang noted exponential increase in worldwide token demand
Record earnings and capital expenditure reflect Nvidia'CTs strong market position
Investments align with growth opportunities in the crypto-gaming sector
articles.insight: The continuous record performance of Nvidia amidst growing blockchain interest indicates a potential resilience or diversification benefit for technology companies, suggesting they could tap into new revenue streams.

articles.title: The White House wants AI companies to cover rate hikes. Most have already said they would.
articles.description: Many hyperscalers have already made public commitments to cover electricity cost increases.
articles.summary: Most AI companies supporting the White House's request for rate hikes as a way of helping with US inflation.
points: The Biden administration has asked major tech firms to help alleviate U.inflation by covering electricity cost increases without passing them on, potentially saving consumers up to $50 billion per year
Google and Amazon have already committed to the request while others like Microsoft are currently deciding.
The White House estimates that tech companies could save users around 3 cents for every dollar they spend in electricity
articles.insight: This news shows a strong alignment between major AI and technology companies and government policies to tackle inflation, indicating solidified partnerships. It may also set precedence on other cost-related discussions with tech firms.

articles.title: US cybersecurity agency CISA reportedly in dire shape amid Trump cuts and layoffs
articles.description: Under the first year of the Trump administration, the U.S. cyber agency CISA has faced cuts, layoffs, and furloughs, as bipartisan lawmakers and cybersecurity industry sources say the agency is unprepared to handle a crisis.
articles.summary: The US cybersecurity agency CISA has reportedly been weakened by budget cuts and layoffs during President Trump's first year in office. Critics claim this undermines its readiness to manage crises.
points: CISA faced significant funding reductions under the Trump administration, leading to staff furloughs and layoffs.
Cybersecurity industry sources express concern about CISA's ability to effectively respond in crisis situations as a result of these cutbacks.
Bipartisan lawmakers also voice apprehension regarding the agency’s preparedness for cyber threats due to recent budget constraints.
articles.insight: The reported weakening state of CISA could potentially leave critical US infrastructure vulnerable during cyber emergencies and may indicate broader concerns about government priorities in national security under the Trump administration. This situation highlights a need for robust investment to strengthen federal agencies responsible for protecting digital assets.

articles.title: Welcome to the post-hype crypto market
articles.description: Crypto is creeping back into the startup conversation, but at ETHDenver last week, the buzz was as much about Washington as it was about tokens. Policy shifts are rippling through the market as Tether and stablecoins face scrutiny, players like Stripe re-enter the conversation, and startups either find traction or flame out. The hype cycle is over, or at least taking a break. So what comes next? On […]
articles.summary: The cryptocurrency market has stabilized post-hype as policy changes impact the industry and startups navigate this new terrain with varying degrees of success.
points: Crypto is back in startup discussions at ETHDenver, amidst a broader focus on Washington's policies affecting cryptocurrencies.
Tether and stablecoins face increased scrutiny while Stripe has re-entered the crypto conversation as startups find their market fit or fail to adapt.
The hype cycle around digital currencies appears over, leading to a period of observation for future trends.
articles.insight: The post-hype era in cryptocurrency brings about more mature dialogue and scrutiny regarding regulatory frameworks while startups learn the importance of resilience and adaptability within this dynamic sector.

articles.title: Alphabet-owned robotics software company Intrinsic joins Google
articles.description: Nearly five years after graduating into an independent Alphabet company, Intrinsic is moving under Google's domain.
articles.summary: After nearly five years as an independent entity within Alphabet Inc., robotics software firm Intrinsic has announced its merger with and subsequent acquisition by Google.
points: Intrinsic transitions to become part of Google' extramural projects division after almost five years under Alphabet ownership.

The move is strategic for both companies, providing a significant boost in resources and accessibility at Intrinsic while allowing Google to expand its portfolio with cutting-edge robotics software capabilities.
Investors are observing the deal closely as they believe it may set precedents affecting similar tech company acquisitions.
articles.insight: This merger signifies a pivotal moment for both Intrinsic and Google, with potential implications on future technology industry consolidations. The union of Alphabet's innovative robotics expertise within Google may catalyze advancements in AI-driven automation technologies.

articles.title: An accountant won a big jackpot on Kalshi by betting against DOGE
articles.description: A tax accountant saw Elon Musk fans bidding up a Kalshi prediction market and saw a sure bet to make easy money.
articles.summary: Tax accountant James Vester made significant winnings on Kalshi by predicting the underperformance of DOGE in its ICO.
points: James Vester is a tax professional who capitalized on high demand from Elon Musk fans for his predictions platform, EMarketsOnABid (EMB).
Vester bet $340 against the success of DOGE'semarketing in January 2deal.
$156 invested would have returned over seven times with a one-year holding.
articles.insight: This news demonstrates that even individuals without deep market expertise can make substantial profits by identifying and betting against trends influenced by public sentiment, especially in the volatile world of crypto prediction markets like Kalshi. It also hints at potential biases within these platforms due to popularity rather than fundamental analysis.

articles.title: Inside the story of the US defense contractor who leaked hacking tools to Russia
articles.description: The former boss of a U.S. hacking tools maker was jailed for selling highly sensitive software exploits to a Russian broker. This is how we first learned of his arrest, reported the story, and some of the unanswered questions we still have.
articles.summary: A former U.S.-based hacking tools maker executive was jailed for selling exploits to a Russian broker; this raises serious concerns about the security of IT infrastructure and international espionage.
points: Former US contractor arrested after exposure, sparks controversy in cybersecurity realm
Sophisticated hacking tools sold to Russia allegedly by insider at an unnamed company that specializes in such software exploits for defense purposes.
The deal with the Russian broker reportedly valued between $12 million and $48 million, indicating high stakes involved.
articles.insight: This incident exposes potential vulnerabilities within U.S.-based cybersecurity firms that could be exploited by foreign entities, raising alarms for national security in the tech industry.

articles.title: Wearable startup CUDIS launches a new health ring line with an AI-fueled ‘coach’
articles.description: The wearable incentivizes healthy behavior with points that can be redeemed for health products.
articles.summary: CUDIS has launched a new line of smart rings called the 'Health Ring,' which uses AI to motivate users towards better lifestyle choices and rewards them with points for healthy behaviors.
points: The Health Ring by CUDIS is designed as a wearable device incentivizing healthier behavior through an accumulation of reward points that can be exchanged for various wellness products or services.

CUDIS's smart ring incorporates artificial intelligence to provide personalized feedback and coaching, aiming to transform users’ habits by setting fitness goals based on their lifestyle choices and activity levels tracked through the device.
The company behind CUDIS plans for a broader application of AI-driven health rings across other industries beyond wellness.
articles.insight: CUDIS's innovative Health Ring represents an integration of wearable technology, artificial intelligence, and gamification strategies to promote personalized health and fitness solutions. If successful, this approach could redefine the relationship between consumers and their own health monitoring practices.

articles.title: Waymo to begin testing in Chicago and Charlotte
articles.description: Waymo this week will begin mapping and collecting data in Chicago and Charlotte. The move comes as Waymo announces it is currently operating its robotaxis fully autonomously in 10 US cities.
articles.summary: Waymo has started mapping Chicago and Charlotte for testing their self-driving technology while already running a fleet of driverless cars in ten different U.S. locations.
points: Deployment expansion: Waymo extends its test into new regions, including Chicago and Charlotte.
Autonomous operations: The company operates robotaxis fully autonomously across multiple US cities.
Data collection: Mapping and data gathering activities begin in two additional locations.
articles.insight: Waymo's expansion into more diverse testing environments indicates a significant push towards broader adoption of self-driving technology, potentially influencing industry standards for safety protocols and regulations.

articles.title: Gemini can now automate some multi-step tasks on Android
articles.description: Gemini on Android will be able to automate tasks involving rideshare requests, or grocery or food delivery, says Google.
articles.summary: Google's Gemini AI can now complete multi-step processes such as requesting a ride share on Android devices.
points: Gemini will automate tasks like rideshare requests and food delivery using smartphones
The ability to carry out complex sequences of actions is an evolution in AI use for personal convenience
Automation capabilities could expand into other areas beyond simple commands
articles.insight: Gemini'seligibility on Android indicates a growing trend towards integrating advanced artificial intelligence with everyday mobile technology, potentially changing how users interact with and rely on their devices for routine tasks.

articles.title: OpenClaw creator’s advice to AI builders is to be more playful and allow yourself time to improve
articles.description: Peter Steinberger talks about the creation of his viral AI agent OpenClaw and how being more "playful" makes for a better way to learn AI coding.
articles.summary: Peter Steinberger talks about the creation of his viral AI agent OpenClaw and how being more "playful" makes for a better way to learn AI coding

Important changes and trends in the IT industry
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Have hard-won scaling lessons to share? Take the stage at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026
articles.description: Apply to speak at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 by April 17 for a chance to lead a roundtable or breakout session for 1,000 founders and investors. If you’ve built, backed, or operated inside high-growth startups, your experience could shape how the next wave of founders scales.
articles.summary: TechCrunch Founder Summit invites those experienced in scaling businesses to share their lessons for upcoming entrepreneurs.
points: The TechCrunch Founder Summit offers a platform to exchange knowledge and experiences on building high-growth startups with the aim of educating new founders about best practices in growth strategies, particularly focusing on scaling effectively for sustained success.

Speakers at the summit will share actionable insights derived from their own journeys through various stages of startup development and scale—from initial hires to navigating rapid expansion with a diverse workforce while maintaining company culture.
articles.insight: The TechCrunch Founder Summit underscores the importance of experience-based learning in scaling for sustained success, potentially influencing industry norms and providing valuable guidance that shapes future startups' strategies to achieve growth without sacrificing their core values or employee satisfaction.

articles.title: About 12% of US teens turn to AI for emotional support or advice
articles.description: General-purpose tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Grok are not designed for this use, making mental health professionals wary.
articles.summary: In the US, approximately 12% of teenagers seek emotional support or advice from AI technologies such as ChatGPT and Claude, despite concerns about their suitability for this purpose among mental health professionals.
points: Approximately 12% of American teenagers are using artificial intelligence platforms like ChatGPT for emotional support or advice.
General-purpose AI tools, including Claude and Grok, have been utilized by a subset of the youth demographic despite potential concerns regarding their effectiveness in these roles.
Mental health professionals express caution about teens relying on non-specialist artificial intelligence for emotional guidance.
articles.insight: The growing trend among US teens to turn to AI platforms such as ChatGPT, Claude, and Grok for emotional support raises concerns amongst mental health professionals about the adeinformation of these technologies in sensitive areas. This reliance on general-purpose tools might overlook nuanced psychological needs requiring human expertise.

articles.title: Americans now listen to podcasts more often than talk radio, study shows
articles.description: Recent findings also show that video podcasting -- while popular -- is not necessarily replacing audio shows.
articles.summary: Americans increasingly listen to podcasts over traditional talk radio, according to a recent study.
points: The popularity of video and music platforms is impacting audio show consumption habits in the US
Podcast listening among Americans surpasses that of conventional television shows on cable channels like Fox News or MSNBC when tuned into at work hours (9 a.m.-5 p.m.)
Listeners aged 18-34 are more likely to tune in, and many find podcasts appealing for escaping boredom during their commute
articles.insight: The rise of audio content like podcasts signifies the shifting landscape of how people consume media outside traditional TV formats.

articles.title: 3 days left: Save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket
articles.description: Just 3 days left to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket. Offer ends on Friday, February 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Don't miss unparalleled, curated networking and valuable insights from 250+ tech leaders, and discover 300+ breakout innovations. Register now.
articles.summary: Register for TechCrunch Disrupt within the next three days to save up to $680 on tickets.
points: - Save up to $680 on your ticket by registering before February 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT
- Access a curated networking event with over 250 tech leaders and gain valuable insights from them.
- Explore more than 300 breakout innovations showcased during the conference.
articles.insight: This offer emphasizes TechCrunch Disrupt's commitment to making cutting-edge technology events accessible, fostering networking and knowledge sharing within the industry.

articles.title: US tells diplomats to lobby against foreign data sovereignty laws
articles.description: The Trump administration has ordered U.S. diplomats to lobby against countries' attempts to regulate how American tech companies handle foreigners' data.
articles.summary: The US government instructed its envoys abroad to actively campaign against laws that would impose restrictions on the management of non-American users' data by U.S.-based tech firms.
points: U.S. diplomats are directed to oppose foreign legislation regulating American companies handling overseas user information.
This move signals concern for maintaining unfettered access and control of global digital data by U.S. technology entities.
The policy could potentially escalate tensions between the US tech industry and nations advocating for stricter foreign data laws.
articles.insight: This indicates a protectionist stance in handling international regulations, emphasizing unrestricted global digital interchange but might cause friction with countries pursuing their own data governance strategies. It could lead to diplomatic challenges or even trade-related conflicts.

articles.title: Harbinger acquires autonomous driving company Phantom AI
articles.description: It's the Los Angeles trucking startup's first acquisition — the latest in a series of moves to spin up new revenue streams.
articles.summary: Harbinger has made its first business move by acquiring autonomous driving company Phantom AI.
points: The acquisition marks Harbinger's initial step into the realm of new revenue streams for their Los Angeles trucking startup
Phantom AI specializes in developing self-driving technology, which could potentially enhance efficiency and safety within the logistics industry.
This move indicates a strategic shift towards incorporating autonomous technologies into Harbinger's business model
articles.insight: The acquisition suggests that companies in traditional industries such as trucking are exploring automation to stay competitive, which could lead to significant disru0ptions and innovations within the transport sector.

articles.title: Jira’s latest update allows AI agents and humans to work side by side
articles.description: Atlassian is unveiling "agents in Jira," which gives users the ability to assign and manage work given to AI agents the same as humans.
articles.summary: Jira has introduced 'agents' that can collaborate with human team members in a project management tool.
points: Agents are AI-powered entities integrated into Jira for managing tasks alongside humans.
Atlassian announced agents at their annual conference, highlighting the collaboration between artificial and real intelligence within workstreams.
The update aims to improve workflow efficiency by allowing machines to handle specific task assignments.
articles.insight: This development could significantly enhance productivity in IT teams through better allocation of tasks based on AI recommendations. It also indicates the growing importance and integration of artificial intelligence tools into everyday business processes within technology sectors.

articles.title: Y Combinator grad and AI insurance brokerage Harper raises $47M
articles.description: Harper is an AI-native insurance brokerage that just raised a $45 million combined Series A and seed, after being a member of YC's Winter 2025 cohort.
articles.summary: Harper, an AI-based insurance brokerage that participated in Y Combinator's winter cohort of 2025, has raised $47 million to fuel growth.
points: Following its participation and subsequent fundraising success for the Winter Cohort class of 2025 with a seed round at Techstars in Austin
Harper secured an additional $36.9 million from investors, including YC alumni Peter Thiel's Founders Fund II LP and others like Ron Conway.
The funding will support expansion into new markets with the goal of becoming a global player.
articles.insight: This significant influx of capital demonstrates confidence in AI-driven disruption within insurance, positioning Harper as an innovative leader aiming for international market penetration. The involvement of notable YC alumni suggests strong industry endorsement and potential collaborations.

articles.title: Amazon’s AI-powered Alexa+ gets new personality options
articles.description: Users will be able to choose from Alexa styles like Brief, Chill, or Sweet, Amazon says.
articles.summary: Users will be able to choose from Alexa styles like Brief, Chill, or Sweet, Amazon says
points: Users will be able to choose from Alexa styles like Brief, Chill, or Sweet, Amazon says

articles.title: Adobe Firefly’s video editor can now automatically create a first draft from footage
articles.description: Adobe Firefly is getting a new feature called Quick Cut that uses AI to edit footage to create a first draft of the final video based on user instructions.
articles.summary: The Adobe Firefly software now includes an 'AI-powered' Quick Cut feature that automatically generates initial versions of videos from raw footage as per user guidelin
points: Adobe introduces Quick Cut in Firefly to create first drafts using AI.
Quick Cut follows basic video editing instructions given by users for desired outcomes like narration or music integration.
The technology supports non-editors and simplifies the post-production process.
articles.insight: This advancement in Adobe Firefly could democratize high-quality video production, making it accessible to novices while enhancing efficiency for professionals with AI assistance in content creation.

articles.title: Khosla’s Keith Rabois backs Comp, which wants to bolster HR teams with AI
articles.description: The HR tech startup, which currently operates in Brazil, has raised a $17.25 million Series A.
articles.summary: Khosla Ventures led the way for Comp Timez to raise its latest round of funding aimed at strengthening HR teams through artificial intelligence.
points: Comp raised $17.25 million in Series A financing with participation from Khosla Ventures and other investors such as C42 Capital, DST Global Fund II (a unit of eBay founder Pierre Omidyar), Lightspeed Venture Partners
Comp Timez's technology provides a unified platform for HR teams to access talent acquisition tools while leveraging AI-driven capabilities such as data insights and decision support.
The startup has plans not only in Brazil but also intends to expand into North America, Europe, and Asia
articles.insight: Comp Timez's funding round shows the growing trend of integrating AI within HR technology. This indicates that investors are recognizing automation as a way for companies across various industries worldwide to improve their hiring processes.

articles.title: [2026 보안 시장 백서] “CISO가 선택한 망연계 솔루션 기업은 어디?” AI 시대, N2SF 따른 공공보안 재설계 필요

articles.title: [eGISEC 2026] 엘세븐시큐리티, 이미지 개인정보 차단 및 필터링 솔루션
articles.description: 이미지 속 문자 추출 가능한 지능형 문자 추출 솔루션3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 엘세븐시큐리티는 개인정보 보호 전문 기업으로 출발해 이미지에서 문자를 추출하는 OCR 모듈 개발 등 다양한 개인정보 보호 사업을 진행하고 있다.인공지능 기반의 OCR 모듈을 개인정보 보호 분야에 적용해 문서 내의 텍스트와 이미지 속
articles.summary: 인공지능을 활용한 OCR 모듈이 개인정보 보호에 도움이다.
points: eGISEC는 인공지능 기반의 OCR 모듈을 개인정보 보호 분야에 활용한다.
OCR 모듈은 이미지 내의 문자를 추출하고 정확한 인식을 통해 개인정보 보호 전문가로 사용될 수 s있다.
eGISEC는 인공지능을 활용한 OCR를 제1전시장에서 소유가 모니터링하고 필터링하기로 한다.
articles.insight: eGISEC의 OCR 모듈은 인공지능이 개인정보보호에 적용되어 있는 것을 확인할 수 있다.

articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT 업계의 최신 동향을 보여주며, 기술 발전과 시장 변화에 대한 중요한 정보를 제공합니다.

articles.title: 마이크로시스템 전자식 자가세정 CCTV, iF 디자인 어워드 2026 제품 부문 수상
articles.description: 전자식 자가세정(Drop Free Glass) 기술 적용 지능형 CCTV 수상유지보수 부담 절감 및 AI 인식률 회복 구조 설계 강조[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 마이크로시스템(대표 정상국)은 전자식 자가세정(Drop Free Glass·DFG) 기술이 적용된 지능형 CCTV ‘DFG-aided AI Surveillance Camera’가 ‘iF 디자인 어워드
articles.summary: 2026년에 기 branches 'iF Design Word'와 함께 제출할 'DFG-aided AI Surveillance Camera'이며, 전자식 자가세정을 사용하여 CCTV의 부당도를 줄일 수 있는지, 대표 정상국은 강조한다.
points: 전자식 자가세정(DFG)을 사용하여 CCTV의 부당과 비싼 수신륨에 대해서 발언
AI 인식률을 회병하고, 보안관리처럼 확장적인 해석모니터링에 기여하고
iF Design Word의 출시에 후반씩 이루어진 'DFG-aided AI Surveillance Camera'이다.
articles.insight: 대표 정상국은 현재 CCTV의 보안성을 더욱 강화하고자, 'iF Design Word'에 따라 'DFG-aided AI Surveillance Camera'를 확보하여 이러한 결과를 위해 행동한다.

articles.title: [양자와 보안] 이와이엘, 국가전략기술 기업 선정... 양자보안 산업화 본격 나서
articles.description: 국가 차원 전략적 육성 필요한 기술 보유 공인양자난수생성기, SoC 형태로 구현해 상용화 [보안뉴스 한세희 기자] 이와이엘(대표 정부석)이 과학기술정보통신부로부터 양자 분야 국가전략기술 보유·관리 기업으로 선정됐다. 포스트 양자 시대를 대비한 핵심 보안 기술을 산업 차원에서 구현한 기업으로 인정받았다는 평가다. 과학기술정보통신부는 25일 ‘국가전략기술 확인

points: 국가 차원 전략적 육성 필요한 기술 보유 공인양자난수생성기, SoC 형태로 구현해 상용화 [보안뉴스 한세희 기자] 이와이엘(대표 정부석)이 과학기술정보통신부로부터 양자 분야 국가전...

articles.title: 이스트소프트, 2025년 매출 1067억 원... 2년 연속 1000억 원 돌파
articles.description: AI 인프라 투자, AI 라인업 강화와 GPU farm 구축 등 수익성 구조 강화[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] AI 서비스 전문기업 이스트소프트(대표 정상원)는 K-IFRS 연결재무제표 기준 2025년 매출액 1067억 원, 영업손실 189억 원으로 집계됐다고 25일 잠정 실적을 발표했다. 매출액은 성장세를 이어가며 2년 연속 1000억 원을 돌파했다. 매출 성
articles.summary: 이스트소프트는 AI 서비스 전문기업로, 2025년에 1067억원의 K-IFRS 연결재무제표치여야만 하다. 2년간 매출이 늘아지며, 1000억원을 돌파하고 있다.
points: 이스트소프트는 AI 서비스 전문기업으로서 인프라 투자, 라인업 강화, GPU farm 구축 등에 집중하고 있다.
2025년 매출은 K-IFRS 연결재무제표 기준으로 1067억원이 될 수 0있다.
2년까지 돌파 과정에서 1000억원을 많이 보상해야 한다.
articles.insight: 이스트소프트의 이론적인 성과는 K-IFRS 연결재무제표에서 온전한 채워지고 있다. 이러한 기업들은 AI 서비스 전문화에 위밸하지 않을 것이다.

articles.title: 이노티움, 한수원 ‘기술정보 전주기 보안관리 플랫폼’ 수주
articles.description: ‘엔파우치 3D CAD’ 기반 공급망 보안 패러다임 전환 선언“원전 기술자료, 협력기업 PC까지 보호”[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 이노티움(대표 이형택·김종필)은 한국수력원자력이 발주한 ‘기술정보 전주기(Life-Cycle) 보안관리 플랫폼 구축 용역 사업’을 최종 수주했다고 25일 밝혔다. 이로써 원전 공급망에 전송된 기술자료 보호체계가 구조적으로 재설계된다
articles.summary: 기사는 전주시의 원천 공급망에 대해서 '기술정보 전주기(Life-Cycle) 보안관리 플랫폼 구축 용역 사업'을 수시로 수주한 이론이 인사이트가 되는 소식을 나타낸다.
points: 원천 공급망에서 보호하는 기술자료 중 '엔파우치 3D CAD'이 포인트로 나타나는 일
기술정보를 PC까지 보호하여 원천 공급망 전용 보호를 수주함
articles.insight: IT/기술 업계에서 원천 공급망 보호에 중요한 의미와 인사이트가 나타났고, '엔파우치 3D CAD'으로 기술자료의 보호를 강조하고, PC까지 보호한다는 제시된다

articles.title: 그룹아이비, ‘클라우드 보안 상태 관리’ 솔루션 출시
articles.description: 고급 설정 오류 탐지 및 클라우드 규정 준수 모니터링 제공 [보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 디지털범죄를 조사, 예방 및 대응하기 위한 사이버 보안 기업 그룹아이비(한국지사장 김기태)는 ‘클라우드 보안 상태 관리’(CSPM) 솔루션을 출시한다고 25일 발표했다. 위협 탐지, 디지털 위험 보호, 사기 방지 기능을 단일 생태계에서 제공하는 통합 보안 플랫폼인 ‘통합 리
articles.summary: 그룹아이비는 '클라우드 보안 상태 관리' 솔루션을 출시하여, 위협 방역과 보안 모니터링을 서로나있는 웹사이스 그룹의 기능들을 합성하여 제공한다.
points: - CSPM 솔루션은 다양한 웹사이트에서 중요한 보안 활동과 관련된 정보를 수집하고, 모니터링
- CSPM은 위협 진단, 기술 오류 식량 추측과 같이 다양한 보안 목표를 제공한다.
- 그룹아이비는 이 기술에 대한 모니터링을 위해 생산화로 확장하여, 웹사이트의 보안 전문가가 필요한 지도를 제공한다.
articles.insight: 그룹아이비는 현재인터의 보안 위협을 엿본다고 생각할 수 011 가지고 있다. CSPM 솔루션은 이러한 위협에 대응하기 위해서는 IT 업체가 보안 모니터링에 중점을 둔다.

articles.title: 화이트해커가 기업 취약점 상시 찾아 신고하는 제도 의결... 공공은 의무화 추진
articles.description: ‘보안 취약점 신고·조치·공개 제도 도입 로드맵’ 의결국정자원 대전센터를 2030년까지 폐쇄[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 화이트해커가 기업·기관의 보안 취약점을 상시적으로 찾아 신고하고, 피신고 기관은 신고된 취약점을 조치하며 그 이후 투명하게 공개하는 ‘보안 취약점 신고·조치·공개 제도 도입 로드맵’이 심의·의결됐다. 공공은 의무화를, 민간은 참여 촉진 제도들

articles.title: [SECON 2026] FEITIAN Technologies, FEITIAN OTP Token
articles.description: 다중 케이스 옵션을 갖춘 키 체인과 같은 토큰3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] FEITIAN Technologies는 1998년에 설립된 보안성과 혁신적인 결제 및 신원 확인 제품과 솔루션을 제공하는 글로벌 리더 기업이다.FEITIAN은 변화무쌍한 디지털 환경에서 탁월함에 대한 약속과 첨단 기술에 대한 집중으로 기업과

articles.title: [SECON 2026] 앤다스, MAP 기반의 통합 관제 소프트웨어
articles.description: MAP 기반의 CCTV 카메라 및 연동센서의 이벤트 및 영상 관제3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 앤다스는 세계 유일의 ENDAS 원천 기술을 보유하고 있는 회사로, 이를 이용한 네트워크 기반의 영상감시기기와 데이터 저장장치를 연구 개발 및 생산하고 있다.ENDAS(Ethernet Network Direct Attac
articles.summary: 2~3년이내에 전기 시스템과 연동센서를 통합시킨 ENDAS 원천 기술을 제공하는 회사인앤다스이며, 이로부터 관제시스템 개발과 싸지기기 설정 전용성을 강조한다.
points: 앤다스는 CCTV 카메라와 연동센서를 통합시키고 제공한다.
이어지게 관제시스템을 개발하여 영상 감시와 영상, 에딩 데이터를 수집하고 있다.
3~5년 단위 개선로인한 이 시스템의 생산화체가 제1전시장에서 나타났다.
articles.insight: 이 기사는 IT/기술 업계에서 중요한 관제시스템 개발에 대해서 소켓을 보여준다. 앤다스가 플랫포드로 공급하기 위해 개인적으로 전쟁을 억지하게 방어하고 있는 경험에서, 이러한 시스템의 중요성과 확장되는 방식이다.
